[[Shin Uchiha]] is able to perform a [[space–time ninjutsu]] using his [[Sharingan]].<ref name="c705">''Naruto'' chapter 700+5, pages 14-16</ref>

== Usage ==
This technique creates a spiralling void centred on the user's eye, drawing everything within its confines inwards and transporting them to another location — even affecting [[chakra]]-based substances. By focusing on nearby targets, the technique can also be used from a distance.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 23</ref> The technique activates quickly enough that it can capture a target before they have time to react, and the size and shape of the spatial barrier can be manipulated to some extent to fit the situation.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 700+6, page 16</ref>

Shin is able to activate this technique using his right eye in order to transport himself to the locations of his [[Sharingan Spying Creature|spying creatures]], emerging from a void created by their own Sharingan.<ref name="c705"/> He can also channel this technique through the creatures themselves, allowing him and his [[Shin Uchiha (Clones)|clones]] to strategically retreat to their [[Shin Uchiha's Hideout|hideout]] at a moment's notice.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 700+4, page 6</ref>
